entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 5.7°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
